description:
THE ORIGINAL #1 VEGAS CASINO SLOTS with over 15 million players worldwide is now even more awesome. Enjoy multi pay lines, various themes, surprising mini games, super jackpot, virtual shop & more! Absolutely FREE! 

Slot Machine got BIGGER & BETTER with v5.0! Brand New Look & Loads of Exciting Feature

TOP FEATURES:

–  MULTI BETLINES - Play up with Max Bets of 200 Chips with 5 Paylines

- 6 EXCITING CASINO GAMES – Super Spinner, Lucky's Pot of Gold, Video Poker, Scratch Card, Turkey Smash and Super Derby. ‘Play for Fun’ OR ‘Play with Coins’!

- PROGRESSIVE SUPER JACKPOT – Get Rich Quick! Free chips every 60 seconds! $100 Base value. Increments after 3 minutes. Ability to double Jackpot winnings

- ONLINE LEADERBOARDS & ACHIEVEMENTS – Compete with other players for top honors on 3 online leaderboards & earn 25+ badges

- 2x MULTIPLIERS to double your winnings. Packs of 1/2/12 hours and 7 days 

- Online TOURNAMENTS & MULTIPLAYER MODE to compete with thousands of players online

- Slots Loyalty Program With Pocket Change – Earn free real rewards just for playing each day! Amazing gifts available from brands like Nike, Beats By Dre, Amazon, and Sony! Check out the 'Rewards' section under 'Get Xtras'.

- Virtual Shop with lots of exciting lifestyle goods to be earned

- 'GET XTRAS' BONUS (Super Sunday, 3 In A Row, 500 Spins). Upgrade to Slot Machine+ for upto $25,000 every week! 

- AUTO SCORES RECOVERY 

++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
> Slot Machine ACHIEVEMENTS
++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
#1 Loved the world over - the undisputed Top Slots game in the world for more than 3 years!
#2 #13 Ranked Game (All Games) in US. #2 in Casino games category
#3 Top 10 Casino games in more than 50 countries
#4 Featured in New & Noteworthy in more than 90 stores!


ALL FEATURES 

- Upgrade to Slot Machine+ to play with higher payouts & more time!
- NUDGE AND HOLD to enhance your winnings. Get 25 Free every day!
- 'GET XTRAS' Bonus for returning users: Play smart to get '3 in a Row', 'Super Sunday' and '500 Spins' bonus credits
- High Stakes with 'JACKPOT' of 3600 chips (CENTER line only)
- Multiple exciting skins - American, Vegas, Halloween, Xmas and Aqua 
- Free Spins for Bells (CENTER line only)
Play for top honors against cross-platform competitors!
Updated 'Statistics' to keep track of all your achievements, bonuses and scores
- New & improved Tutorial & Help
- Advanced 'Settings' screen with choice of 3 sounds - Classic, Casino or Musical and multiple themes
 Scores Recovery - Now get your scores back even if you reinstall the game!
- NEW & EXCITING  War of the Platforms! Compete with other iPhone users for top honors!
- Slot Machine+  with HIGH PAYOUTS, UNLIMITED MINI GAMES & ZERO ADS is ALSO available - Download and play NOW!

Hope you continue to play and enjoy the game and keep sharing your feedback. We're listening to you!

Love our Apps? Want new features? Got suggestions? Email your feedback to supportios@apostek.com

Say hello, talk to us and keep up with our newest games:

Twitter: twitter.com/apostekapps
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/ApostekApps
Youtube: http://youtu.be/PUriwGjfglk
releaseNotes:
1) New and Improved user experience 
2) Turkey smash gets better
3) Another variation of Video Poker : Deuces Wild
4) Mini Games have been enhanced and are more fun to play now. 
5) Loads of bug fixes
